name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WAcall: Make SIM calls from WhatsApp Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a call button next to every number on WhatsApp Web. With one click, your mobile dials the number instantly through your SIM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When leads are hot, every second counts. Manually entering phone numbers from WhatsApp Web to your mobile slows you down.

It wastes precious seconds, breaks your workflow, and risks missed opportunities.

With WAcall, you get a call button next to every number in WhatsApp Web. One click, and your mobile dials the number instantly through your SIM. 

No more manual typing. No more errors.

Focus on closing deals, not juggling devices. 

With WAcall, you stay efficient, avoid mistakes, and connect with leads while theyâ€™re still hot.

Make every second count. Install WAcall and never miss a hot lead again!
